title: School Curriculum
contentSummary: Covers Math, Science, English, and Social Studies with interactive lessons, quizzes, and tracking tools.

description: Start coding with fun projects and games
title: Computers and Coding
contentSummary: Learn Scratch, Python basics, game development, and logical thinking through fun, interactive lessons.

description: Creative arts and crafts for young minds
title: Art & Creativity
contentSummary: Offers tutorials in drawing, painting, DIY crafts, and digital art to encourage creativity and fine motor skills.

title: Science Explorers
contentSummary: Explore science through fun experiments, virtual labs, and STEM projects to spark curiosity.
